tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE kitchen_design (
  layout_drawing_id INT,
  layout_drawing_name VARCHAR(255),
  appliance_id INT,
  appliance_name VARCHAR(255),
  customer_id INT,
  customer_name VARCHAR(255),
  review_rating INT
);

CREATE TABLE appliance_specifications (
    appliance_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    appliance_name VARCHAR(50),
    brand VARCHAR(50),
    price DECIMAL(10,2),
    energy_rating CHAR(1)
);

CREATE TABLE kitchen_layout_drawings (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  drawing_name VARCHAR(255),
  drawing_url VARCHAR(255),
  designer_id INT,
  FOREIGN KEY (designer_id) REFERENCES designers(id)
);

CREATE TABLE appliance_specifications (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  appliance_name VARCHAR(255),
  brand VARCHAR(255),
  model VARCHAR(255),
  dimensions VARCHAR(255)
);

CREATE TABLE customer_reviews (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  customer_id INT,
  review_title VARCHAR(255),
  review_text TEXT,
  rating INT,
  FOREIGN KEY (customer_id) REFERENCES customers(id)
);

CREATE TABLE kitchen_layout_drawings (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(255),
  designer_id INT,
  drawing_url VARCHAR(255),
  created_at TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE appliance_specifications (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  appliance_name VARCHAR(255),
  brand VARCHAR(255),
  type VARCHAR(50),
  price DECIMAL(10, 2),
  specifications TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE customer_reviews (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  customer_id INT,
  rating INT,
  review TEXT,
  created_at TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE customers (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(255),
  email VARCHAR(255),
  phone_number VARCHAR(20),
  address TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE appliance_specifications (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    appliance_type VARCHAR(50),
    brand_name VARCHAR(50),
    model_number VARCHAR(50),
    price DECIMAL(10,2)
);
